item.title: How AI Is Upending Politics, Tech, the Media, and More
item.description: At WIRED’s AI Power Summit Monday, industry executives and officials discussed the impact artificial intelligence is having on every corner of society—and where it goes from here.

item.title: Anna Wintour Taps Chloe Malle as Vogue U.S. Head of Editorial
item.description: Malle, who currently leads digital editorial for Vogue, is the daughter of actress Candice Bergen and director Louis Malle.
